details: Removes a duplicate section titled "Using labels to highlight project goals and status" from documentation.
Deletes two paragraphs explaining label creation/usage and filtering by labels.
Retains the subsequent "Label example" section with its screenshot.
Focuses on eliminating redundant content about GitHub label management.

original_description:
### Why:

Closes: #40442 

### What's being changed (if available, include any code snippets, screenshots, or gifs):

Further down in the document there is exactly the same content duplicated. I decided to remove the one that was further up the document with no particular reasoning. I think removing either is equally valid.
